```
Define the module TopModule with the specified input and output ports: input mode, input too_cold, input too_hot, input fan_on, output heater, output aircon, and output fan.

Retrieved Related Information:
too_cold: Indicates if the temperature is too cold (Type:Signal)
too_hot: Indicates if the temperature is too hot (Type:Signal)
fan_on: User request to turn on the fan (Type:Signal)
In heating mode (mode = 1), turn the heater on when it is too cold (too_cold = 1) but do not use the air conditioner. (Type:StateTransition)
In cooling mode (mode = 0), turn the air conditioner on when it is too hot (too_hot = 1), but do not turn on the heater. (Type:StateTransition)
The user can also request the fan to turn on (fan_on = 1), even if the heater and air conditioner are off. (Type:StateTransition)
```
source: I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified.
